questions.question: What is the highest road in Oregon?
questions.author: Bob Roberts
questions.notes: I looked in an atlas, but could not find the information I was looking for.

questions.question: What is the best location for photographing a wolf in the wild?
questions.author: Jane Brewer
questions.notes: I am planning a trip and have always wanted to see a wolf!

questions.question: What is the ratio of rolled oats to water for oatmeal?
questions.author: Jon Smith
questions.notes: I don't really like to cook.

answers.answer: 2 parts water, 1 part oats for rolled oats
